verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.
verses.web: “Command the children of Israel, and tell them, ‘See that you present my offering, my food for my offerings made by fire, as a pleasant aroma to me, in their due season.’
verses.ct: "Give this command to the people of Israel: Make sure you present my offerings — the food for my fire offerings, which produce an aroma that pleases me — at their appointed times."

verses.kjv: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.
verses.web: You shall tell them, ‘This is the offering made by fire which you shall offer to LORD: male lambs a year old without defect, two day by day, for a continual burnt offering.
verses.ct: Then tell them, "This is the fire offering you must present to the LORD: 2 one-year-old male lambs without any defects, offered every day as a regular burnt offering.

verses.kjv: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;
verses.web: You shall offer the one lamb in the morning, and you shall offer the other lamb at evening,
verses.ct: Offer one lamb in the morning and the other lamb at evening.

verses.kjv: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.
verses.web: with one tenth of an ephah of fine flour for a meal offering, mixed with the fourth part of a hin of beaten oil.
verses.ct: Include a grain offering of 1 tenth of an ephah of fine flour mixed with 1 fourth of a hin of pressed olive oil.

verses.kjv: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.
verses.web: It is a continual burnt offering which was ordained in Mount Sinai for a pleasant aroma, an offering made by fire to LORD.
verses.ct: This is the regular burnt offering that was established at Mount Sinai — a fire offering that produces an aroma pleasing to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the LORD for a drink offering.
verses.web: Its drink offering shall be the fourth part of a hin for each lamb. You shall pour out a drink offering of strong drink to LORD in the holy place.
verses.ct: The drink offering that goes with each lamb is 1 fourth of a hin. Pour out this offering of fermented drink to the LORD in the holy place.

verses.kjv: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.
verses.web: The other lamb you shall offer at evening. As the meal offering of the morning, and as its drink offering, you shall offer it, an offering made by fire, for a pleasant aroma to LORD.
verses.ct: Offer the second lamb at evening with the same grain offering and drink offering as the morning sacrifice. It is a fire offering that produces an aroma pleasing to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:
verses.web: “ ‘On the Sabbath day, you shall offer two male lambs a year old without defect, and two tenths of an ephah of fine flour for a meal offering mixed with oil, and its drink offering:
verses.ct: On the Sabbath day, offer 2 one-year-old male lambs without any defects, along with a grain offering of 2 tenths of an ephah of fine flour mixed with oil, and its accompanying drink offering.

verses.kjv: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: this is the burnt offering of every Sabbath, in addition to the continual burnt offering and its drink offering.
verses.ct: This Sabbath burnt offering is given every Sabbath, in addition to the regular daily burnt offering and its drink offering.

verses.kjv: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;
verses.web: “ ‘In the beginnings of your months, you shall offer a burnt offering to LORD: two young bulls, one ram, seven male lambs a year old without defect,
verses.ct: On the first day of each month, present a burnt offering to the LORD: 2 young bulls, 1 ram, and 7 one-year-old male lambs, all without any defects.

verses.kjv: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;
verses.web: and three tenths of an ephah of fine flour for a meal offering mixed with oil, for each bull; and two tenth parts of fine flour for a meal offering mixed with oil, for the one ram;
verses.ct: With each bull, include a grain offering of 3 tenths of an ephah of fine flour mixed with oil. With the ram, include a grain offering of 2 tenths of an ephah of fine flour mixed with oil.

verses.kjv: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.
verses.web: and one tenth part of fine flour mixed with oil for a meal offering to every lamb, as a burnt offering of a pleasant aroma, an offering made by fire to LORD.
verses.ct: With each of the 7 lambs, include a grain offering of 1 tenth of an ephah of fine flour mixed with oil. This is a burnt offering — a fire offering that produces an aroma pleasing to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
verses.web: Their drink offerings shall be half a hin of wine for a bull, the third part of a hin for the ram, and the fourth part of a hin for a lamb. This is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
verses.ct: The drink offerings are as follows: half a hin of wine for each bull, 1 third of a hin for the ram, and 1 fourth of a hin for each lamb. This monthly burnt offering is to be made at the beginning of every month throughout the year.

verses.kjv: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the LORD shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: Also, one male goat for a sin offering to LORD shall be offered in addition to the continual burnt offering and its drink offering.
verses.ct: In addition to the regular daily burnt offering and its drink offering, offer 1 male goat as a sin offering to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.
verses.web: “ ‘In the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, is LORD’s Passover.
verses.ct: The LORD's Passover falls on the 14th day of the 1st month.

verses.kjv: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
verses.web: On the fifteenth day of this month shall be a feast. Unleavened bread shall be eaten for seven days.
verses.ct: The festival begins on the 15th day of that month. For 7 days, eat only unleavened bread.

verses.kjv: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:
verses.web: In the first day shall be a holy convocation. You shall do no regular work,
verses.ct: On the 1st day, hold a sacred assembly. Do no regular work on that day.

verses.kjv: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:
verses.web: but you shall offer an offering made by fire, a burnt offering to LORD: two young bulls, one ram, and seven male lambs a year old. They shall be without defect,
verses.ct: Present a fire offering as a burnt offering to the LORD: 2 young bulls, 1 ram, and 7 one-year-old male lambs — all without any defects.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;
verses.web: with their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil. You shall offer three tenths for a bull, and two tenths for the ram.
verses.ct: Their grain offerings should be fine flour mixed with oil: 3 tenths of an ephah for each bull and 2 tenths for the ram.

verses.kjv: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
verses.web: You shall offer one tenth for every lamb of the seven lambs;
verses.ct: For each of the 7 lambs, offer 1 tenth of an ephah.

verses.kjv: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering, to make atonement for you.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering to make atonement for you.

verses.kjv: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.
verses.web: You shall offer these in addition to the burnt offering of the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.
verses.ct: These offerings are in addition to the regular morning burnt offering that you present every day.

verses.kjv: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: In this way you shall offer daily, for seven days, the food of the offering made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to LORD. It shall be offered in addition to the continual burnt offering and its drink offering.
verses.ct: Prepare these same offerings every day for all 7 days — food for the fire offering that produces an aroma pleasing to the LORD. These are offered in addition to the regular daily burnt offering and its drink offering.

verses.kjv: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.
verses.web: On the seventh day you shall have a holy convocation. You shall do no regular work.
verses.ct: On the 7th day, hold a sacred assembly. Do no regular work on that day.

verses.kjv: Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the LORD, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:
verses.web: “ ‘Also in the day of the first fruits, when you offer a new meal offering to LORD in your feast of weeks, you shall have a holy convocation. You shall do no regular work;
verses.ct: On the day of firstfruits — when you bring a new grain offering to the LORD during the Festival of Weeks — hold a sacred assembly. Do no regular work on that day.

verses.kjv: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;
verses.web: but you shall offer a burnt offering for a pleasant aroma to LORD: two young bulls, one ram, seven male lambs a year old;
verses.ct: Present a burnt offering that produces an aroma pleasing to the LORD: 2 young bulls, 1 ram, and 7 one-year-old male lambs.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,
verses.web: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil, three tenths for each bull, two tenths for the one ram,
verses.ct: Their grain offerings should be fine flour mixed with oil: 3 tenths of an ephah for each bull, 2 tenths for the ram,

verses.kjv: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
verses.web: one tenth for every lamb of the seven lambs;
verses.ct: and 1 tenth for each of the 7 lambs.

verses.kjv: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.
verses.web: and one male goat, to make atonement for you.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat to make atonement for you.

verses.kjv: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
verses.web: Besides the continual burnt offering and its meal offering, you shall offer them and their drink offerings. See that they are without defect.
verses.ct: Present all of these — along with their drink offerings — in addition to the regular daily burnt offering and its grain offering. Make sure every animal is without any defects.
